title: ASTRA synthetic gating demo (preprint + reproducibility package)
description:
This deposit provides a citable archive of a preprint and reproducibility materials for the ASTRA synthetic gating demo (v5).

Scope: a controlled, fixed-seed toy experiment demonstrating how an amplitude-based gating (preprocessing) step can suppress a short transient prior to downstream scoring.

Contents:
- paper.pdf (compiled manuscript)
- ASTRA_Source_v5.zip (clean LaTeX sources; includes paper.bbl)
- ASTRA_Ancillary_v5.zip (logs/tables/repro artifacts)
- COMPILE_AUDIT_25X_v5.txt (25Ã— clean-room compile audit)
- SHA256SUMS.txt (integrity checksums)

Notes: This record does not contain proprietary detector data and does not claim any astrophysical detection; it is a method-focused synthetic demonstration with audited artifacts.
